earlyExerciseOption(uint256,uint256).details: Creates shares subject to company repurchase right

returns.equityLotId: The lot ID created on the equity token

exerciseOption(uint256,uint256).details: Checks vesting via VestingComplianceModuleTransfers strike price payment from callerCreates lot on equity token with TransferType.EXERCISE

returns.equityLotId: The lot ID created on the equity token

params.grantIds: Array of grant IDs to check and expire

forfeitOption(uint256).details: Revokes vesting schedule, returns unvested to pool

returns.record: Early exercise record (empty if not early exercised)

returns.exercisableShares: Number of shares that can be exercised

returns.totalValue: Total value of ISO grants (shares  strike price)

grantOption(address,uint8,uint256,uint25.details: Creates a lot on this token and attaches vesting via VestingComplianceModuleRegisters with company wallet's Rule 701 trackerValidates strike price against equity token's 409A

params.strikePrice: Exercise price per share (must be >= 409A FMV)

returns.grantId: The ID of the new grant

packedSelectors().details: Each selector is 4 bytes, packed sequentially with no padding      MUST NOT include packedSelectors() itself in the returned selectors      MUST be a pure function (no state access)

params.sharesToRepurchase: Number of unvested shares to repurchase

expireOptions(uint256[]).notice: Expire options that have passed expiration date

forfeitOption(uint256).notice: Forfeit unvested options (called when employee leaves)

getEarlyExerciseRecord(uint256).notice: Get early exercise record for a grant

getEquityToken().notice: Get the target equity token for exercises

getExercisableShares(uint256).notice: Get exercisable shares (vested minus already exercised)

getISOGrantsInYear(address).notice: Get total ISO grants value in current calendar year for a recipient

getPlanURI().notice: Get the plan URI (equity incentive plan document)

getRecipientGrants(address).notice: Get all grants for a recipient

getUnvestedEarlyExerciseShares(uint256).notice: Get remaining unvested shares for early exercised grant

getVestedShares(uint256).notice: Get vested shares for a grant at current time

grantOption(address,uint8,uint256,uint25.notice: Grant stock options to a recipient

packedSelectors().notice: Returns all function selectors for this facet as tightly packed bytes
